# Mitosis Plugins

> Documentation for mitosis-plugins - Enhance cross-framework component development with Mitosis

## Documentation Sets

- [Abridged documentation](https://mitosis-plugins.com/llms-small.txt): a compact version of the documentation for Mitosis Plugins, with non-essential content removed
- [Complete documentation](https://mitosis-plugins.com/llms-full.txt): the full documentation for Mitosis Plugins

## Notes

- The complete documentation includes all content from the official documentation
- The content is automatically generated from the same source as the official documentation
